title: The Love of Summer
description: Kerri Walters had a normal life until she met Summer Donnelly. She had just turned 18 in the small community of Jenkinstown when new neighbours moved in next door, including Summer. The pair become inseparable and it soon becomes clear to Kerri that there is more happening than just a friendship.  Will Kerri hide her feelings from her best friend? What will happen if Summer finds out how Kerri feels? Download today to find out!
author: Sarah          Thompson
